for_sales.sales_text: Sails and rows beautifully and great for a potter with an electric outboard without the sails .

boat.full_description: Built to satisfy a desire for a family dinghy, but not really used as such. Sailed on the Thames, the Solent and the Orwell. The rig gives lots of options and performs well in windy conditions with just jib and mizzen.
boat.name: Pegbox
boat.short_description: Home built Iain Oughtred Penny Fee design with an added jib and bowsprit as per the designer's suggestion
